content.prompt: If a trapezoidal sum overapproximates  ∫ 0 4 f ( x )dx MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3F92@ , and a right Riemann sum underapproximates  ∫ 0 4 f ( x )dx MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3F92@ , which of the following could be the graph of  y=f( x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3BA8@ ?

skill.text: Skill 1.F: Explain how an approximated value relates to the actual value.
